r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $805.7K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Taylor Francis. The average
  contract duration was 0.47 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $89.6K. The longest
  contract was 2.88 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $324.3K.
lookup_name: 'TAYLOR FRANCIS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '805.7K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '44'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '2%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '283%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '239.6K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.47'
s421_mean_contract_value: '89.6K'
s425_max_duration: '2.88'
s422_max_contract_value: '324.3K'
